description:
Ordering KFC has never been easier:
1. Choose your order mode for delivery or pickup.
2. Share your location to find a KFC near you.
3. Order online exclusive deals and more.
4. Pay cash or card.
Download the KFC Mauritius app now and don't forget to rate us!

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Delivery Dodo is a restaurant food delivery company that serves as an intermediary between customers and restaurants. Using our app or website, customers place and pay for an order, which is then conveyed to the participating restaurant. When the food is prepared, a Delivery Dodo courier will collect the food and deliver it to the customer in the comfort of their own home, office or wherever else they have chosen.

Buy Domino’s Pizza online for those fun-filled times that demand something light and awesomely delicious, tease your taste buds with the vivid flavours of cheese-filled, crispy hand tossed crust. With fresh toppings, just ready to be ordered with a swipe. Our Domino’s pizza delivery app has the perfect recipe to build the mood right for any occasion – be it a get together, party, or simply spending time with friends or family.

Domino’s pizza delivery app comes with a quick selection menu, a smartly designed app-interface that lets you order food online of your choice with exclusive deals every day! 
With secure and easy to use payment gateway feasting on your favourite pizza is easy. Save on food order online by using our periodic coupons and find an excuse to order your favourite pizza with attractive offers everyday.

Features
Domino’s Pizza app brings fun in ordering pizza right on your phone & tablet. 
What makes us unique –
* Enhanced User Experience with Quick Swipe
* Find your nearest Domino’s on App
* Quick Buy from Easy Menus
* Improved Order Customisation
* Secure online payment with multiple payment options
* Real-time tracking of orders

Installation/Use of Domino’s Pizza delivery app

Domino’s pizza app requires access to system resources for smooth functioning. This food delivery app requests contact details and location data. Kindly allow the same while installing. 

How to Order?

Domino’s pizza app lets you order pizza online in few steps. 
On opening the app, you will be presented with our latest deals. You can either click on any offers you like or if you are choosy about your pizzas, or wish to browse through the different options, you may browse through the entire menu of assorted offerings. 
After choosing, you may add the selected pizza to the cart, customise it with selective toppings. To complement your order, you may add a bottle of your favourite beverage or dessert and finally go for checkout. 

We accept payment through our app, cash, credit cards and debit cards.

From where will I get the order?

Domino’s app will let you find and choose the nearest Domino’s pizza restaurants in your locality.

Our app will request access to several mobile features, kindly allow access for pizza ordering without any hassles. For any queries related to placing an order, compatibility with device, and other app operations, please visit our website www.dominos.mu or write to us at customercare@dominos.mu
Best Food and beverages delivery services in mauritius

We like our app the way we like our chicken: Fired up and all things PERi-PERi. Order your  favourite Nando’s meals for delivery or collection. Not sure what to get? Tap ‘Surprise Me’ and treat your tastebuds to something different.

P.S. Opt-in for notifications to take advantage of free delivery, exclusive specials and fiery content.

Order food delivery online from a selection of restaurants in Mauritius with the hungrydodo app.
With the hungrydodo app, you can search for restaurants nearby by address, filter restaurants by cuisine type, select & browse the menu of the chosen restaurant, order food for delivery with just a few taps.

Features:
- View restaurants in Mauritius
- Full menu access
- View past orders
- View restaurant location and opening times
- Access saved delivery addresses
- Order for delivery / collection
- Order for now, or choose a delivery time that suits you

Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

Download the app from the App Store, choose your location and we'll present you with personalised location-based Pizza Inn restaurant offerings.
 
We offer the ability to order food for delivery from Pizza Inn. 

Enjoy ordering your favourite pizza with the convenience of delivery.

Simply Good Food - Your Trusted Food Delivery Partner

Discover the easiest way to enjoy delicious meals from your favorite restaurants in Mauritius with the Simply Good Food app!
With our user-friendly interface and efficient service, Simply Good Food brings convenience to your doorstep. Whether you're craving local delicacies, fast food, or gourmet cuisine, we’ve got you covered.

Features You'll Love:
Wide Selection: Browse menus from top restaurants across Mauritius.
Real-Time Tracking: Stay updated with live order tracking.
Secure Payment: Pay with confidence using multiple payment options.

From daily meals to special occasions, Simply Good Food ensures your cravings are satisfied. Download now and experience the joy of hassle-free food delivery!
Eat Simply. Enjoy Good Food.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

Hungry? Get your favourite meals, takeaways and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVOURITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favourites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or Fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighbourhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.

Our burgers & wraps are cooked à la minute, instead of keeping you waiting, we have developed this app so you can order your favourite burgers easily.
Use this app to personalize your burgers with dozens of add-ons and just pick-up your order when you want, or even better: get it delivered.

Features:
- Online food ordering optimized for your mobile device.
- The checkout details are pre-filled, so you can order with just a few clicks.
- Save multiple addresses and pick the preferred one at checkout.
- Real time confirmation of the order - meaning that our team confirms your order right away, with the estimated ready-time.

No confusing calls or busy lines. Just order your burgers when you feel like it!

Hungry in Tamarin or Rivière Noire? If you're in the West of Mauritius and craving something tasty, OnlyEat is made for you. We connect you with the best local restaurants so you can enjoy your favorite dishes without moving an inch. 




OnlyEat delivers your favorite meals from local restaurants — fast, fresh, and with real-time tracking. Forget the wait and the stress. OnlyEat was built to make food delivery simple, quick, and transparent. We partner with trusted local restaurants to ensure your meals are freshly prepared and arrive just like they left the kitchen — hot and ready.





No more guessing where your food is. With OnlyEat, you get full visibility from kitchen to doorstep. Every order placed through OnlyEat comes with real-time tracking. You’ll see exactly when your meal is being prepared, when your delivery is on the move, and when it’s arriving — so you stay in control and never left wondering. 





Currently available in Tamarin & Rivière Noire (Mauritius) We’re starting strong in the West. OnlyEat is now live in Tamarin and Rivière Noire, two of the most vibrant food hubs on the island. More areas coming soon — stay tuned.





Why choose OnlyEat?
Real-time tracking
Get updates at every step of the journey. Know when your meal is leaving the restaurant, when your driver picks it up, and how close they are to your location.
Verified delivery partners
A trusted driver accepts your order, and you instantly see their name, photo, rating, and reviews. All our drivers are verified, trained, and approved — reliable people from your community.
Local restaurants
We support the neighborhood businesses you know and love. Discover new favorites and keep your go-to dishes just a tap away.
Fresh & hot
No pre-packed meals. Every dish is cooked fresh to order and delivered immediately, ensuring you get the quality you expect.
Pickup or delivery
Whether you want to pick it up on the go or enjoy a home delivery, you decide what suits your day best.
Easy to use
The app is clean, modern, and intuitive. It takes just a few taps to browse, order, and track — even on your busiest days.




Delivery options
• Home delivery – Get your food delivered to your door without delay
• Takeaway – Pick up your order directly from the restaurant at the time that suits you
• order ahead– Plan your meals in advance for convenience
• Track your order – Follow every step of the journey live in the app



Where we deliver
• Tamarin
• Rivière Noire
• (Flic en Flac and surrounding areas coming soon)
We’re gradually expanding across the West Coast of Mauritius to offer more people a seamless food ordering experience.



Built in Mauritius, for Mauritius OnlyEat is proudly developed by a local team, fully dedicated to improving how we eat and deliver on the island. Our goal: build a reliable, modern, and enjoyable delivery experience reflecting the Mauritian lifestyle. We live here, we eat here, and we deliver here — just like you.




Your trust matters

• We ensure secure and protected payments
• Our delivery system is built on reliability and punctuality
• Our support team is responsive and helpful
• Real-time tracking keeps you in control
• We believe in full price transparency — no hidden costs




What’s on the menu? Whether you’re in the mood for a juicy burger, fresh sushi, comforting Indian curry, crispy pizza, healthy vegetarian options or sweet desserts — OnlyEat has it all. From classics to specialties, explore your local food scene in one app.


Enjoy a seamless service, an intuitive interface, and hot meals delivered right to your chosen location. Track your order in real time and order with peace of mind. 

Download OnlyEat and discover a new way to order food in Mauritius.

Mob makes it easy to cook simple, delicious meals that fit your schedule - whether you're planning ahead or looking for a last-minute meal.

From speedy weeknight dinners to preppable breakfasts and packed lunches, we help you cook without the stress.

Key features:

Smart shopping list – Add everything in one tap, neatly organised by supermarket aisle.

Pre-built meal plans – Save time with curated weekly plans.

Search by ingredients – Got something to use up? We’ll show you what to cook.

Family-friendly recipes – Meals everyone will actually want to eat.

Cook with ease – Step-by-step recipes with your screen unlocked while you cook.

Delicious, reliable recipes – Tested by our team of in-house chefs.

Our Mission:

Mob is on a mission to make weekly cooking easy, fun, and delicious. We do this because cooking changes lives. It improves your health, lifts your mood, and saves you money.

Whether you're looking for a healthy dinner after work, a packed lunch for tomorrow, or a prep-friendly breakfast to start the day, Mob is here to help you cook incredible meals throughout the week.

Today, we're a community of over 500,000 home cooks. We make everyday cooking exciting and aspirational—not a chore. Not just a boring task that needs to be done, but something to look forward to, that results in a delicious meal.

We're building a movement of people who have cooking as an embedded part of their weekly routine. It's part of their life.

They are proud to say: "I'm a cook."

Try Mob Premium free for 7 days!

Get access to Mob’s full recipe library and premium features.

If you choose to purchase Mob Premium, your Apple account will be charged, once your trial has elapsed. Auto-renewal can be turned off at any time in your App Store settings after purchase. Cancelling will stop future charges, but you’ll keep premium features until the end of the current period. Deleting the app does not cancel your subscription.

Privacy Policy: https://www.mob.co.uk/privacy-policy

Terms of Service: https://www.mob.co.uk/terms-of-service

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeula

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

Have an idea to make your cooking experience with ReciMe better? Please email us at hello@recime.app so we can help!

Made by foodies for foodies in Mauritius.

Maribon is the ultimate mobile application for foodies in Mauritius, offering an unparalleled dining experience. Discover top-notch restaurants, access detailed information, and enjoy groundbreaking features like food discovery and tracking, bookmarking, social interactions, and much more. Download Maribon now and elevate your food journey!

About:
Welcome to Maribon, the must-have mobile application for food enthusiasts in Mauritius! With Maribon, you can explore the vibrant culinary scene of the island like never before. Whether you're a local or a tourist, Maribon is designed to provide you with the ultimate dining experience, empowering you to discover, connect, and indulge in the finest restaurants and hidden gems across Mauritius.

Groundbreaking Features:
Maribon goes beyond being a mere restaurant discovery app. It introduces groundbreaking features that revolutionize your dining experience. Track your food's journey by liking and posting pictures at every meal. Bookmark your favorite restaurants for quick access and personalized recommendations. Connect with friends and fellow foodies, follow their dining adventures, and share your experiences through vibrant social features.

Discover and Explore:
Maribon offers an extensive collection of restaurants, curated to cater to every palate. From cozy cafes to elegant fine dining establishments, Maribon showcases a diverse range of culinary experiences. With our intuitive search and filter options, finding the perfect restaurant is a breeze. Explore by cuisine type, location, opening times, and more. Unleash your inner foodie and embark on a gastronomic adventure with Maribon!

Restaurant Details and Reviews:
Make informed decisions with detailed restaurant pages on Maribon. Get access to essential information such as menus, opening hours, contact details, and customer reviews. Maribon's user-friendly interface ensures you have all the information at your fingertips, helping you choose the ideal dining spot for any occasion. Read authentic reviews from fellow food lovers and contribute your own opinions to help others make the best choices.

Exclusive Promotions and Offers:
Unlock a world of exclusive promotions and offers with Maribon. Benefit from special discounts, loyalty rewards, and limited-time promos at participating restaurants. Maribon keeps you informed about the latest promotions, ensuring you never miss out on an opportunity to savor delectable meals while saving money or getting extra perks.

Download Maribon now and embark on a food journey you won't forget. Discover the best restaurants in Mauritius, access detailed information, enjoy groundbreaking features like food tracking and social interactions, book tables, order food online, and take advantage of exclusive promotions. Elevate your inner foodie with Maribon today!

Discover and book at thousands of the best restaurants across the Middle East with Eat App. Great for travellers or residents looking to find the perfect dining experience, we have the widest selection of bookable restaurants across the region. Filter and sort restaurants however you need and see menus, reviews and restaurant info. All your reservations are recorded and accessible in the app, and sharable with friends.

We also list thousands of individual restaurant experiences and promotions across the region so you know exactly what's happening in your city every night of the week.

Available in United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, start finding your new favorite place to eat.

Discover - Search and filter and find a great restaurant across the region.

Book - Get a confirmed reservation from the restaurant anytime you want. No need to call.

Experiences - from brunch to special promos and one-off events, find somewhere new to experience tonight. 


Download Eat App for free today.

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

The Magic Stamp app is for people who love receiving rewards but don’t have room in their wallet for multiple stamp cards from all their favourite independent businesses.

The Magic Stamp app gives you access to digital stamp cards for your favourite independent businesses and keeps them all in one place, never to be lost again. 

HOW IT WORKS
We’ve created a unique stamp card experience with no QR codes, no IDs and no faff. Just get stamped and receive your rewards instantly.

Simply present your Magic Stamp Card in participating stores to receive a stamp from the vendor on your next purchase. 

You’ll be rewarded with free goodies as well as receiving exclusive gifts and discounts from your favourite independents.

More Magic Stamp Cards coming very soon...

CIBOUSCAN: Scan Your BEAUTY & FOOD Products – Health Score, Nutri-Score, NOVA and Recipes

CIBOUSCAN is the must-have app to take care of your health, your skin and the planet.
Scan your beauty products and groceries in seconds to see their full ingredients, health score, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, and find better alternatives that suit you.

Beauty: your bathroom under control
	•	Scan your cosmetics (skincare, body care, hair care, makeup, perfume).
	•	Get a complete health score for each product: ingredients list, controversial additives, potential impact on your health.
	•	Check the compatibility with your skin type, specific needs or allergies.
	•	Read real user reviews to choose wisely before buying.
	•	Create your personalized beauty routine and get a routine score to track and improve your habits every day.

Food: scan, decode, cook
	•	Scan your food products to see their Nutri-Score, NOVA, and any additives.
	•	Discover personalized recipes based on your food preferences, favorite or blacklisted products, allergies, diet and the season.
	•	Easily view your scan history to track your consumption over time.
	•	Get smart flexitarian recommendations designed to reduce your environmental impact while eating deliciously.

Practical, complete and privacy-friendly
	•	No account required: use all features completely anonymously.
	•	Works with and syncs automatically to the CIBOULETTE app if you already have it.
	•	One smart assistant for your beauty choices, grocery shopping, Nutri-Score and NOVA – all in one app.

Why choose CIBOUSCAN?
	•	One app to scan both BEAUTY and FOOD products.
	•	Access to health scores, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, skin compatibility.
	•	Real user reviews to help you compare and decide.
	•	Personalized recipes for healthy eating without frustration.
	•	A flexible and kind approach: better choices without forbidding what you love.
	•	Everything is anonymous, practical and made for you.

Download CIBOUSCAN now and join the CIBOULETTE team to shop smarter, eat better and take care of yourself and the planet.

** CibouScan is not affiliated with any other apps

DELIVERY OR PICKUP?

Tired of cooking the same 3 meals on repeat? Zest integrates a mind-blowing cooking education into your routine. Learn to cook with us through step-by-step explanations of foundational cooking concepts in fewer than 10 minutes and dishes that bring the concept to life. Our recipes are created by two former Michelin star chefs, distilled by a home chef, and cooked by you, the superstar home cook that you are (or will be). We don't assume any prior culinary knowledge. We meet you where you are and help you improve.
 
Stop copying traditional recipes - start learning from Zest. We've cooked those delicious Bon Appetit dinners. But when we took away the recipes we felt like lost puppies. Zest is designed to teach you the how's and why's of cooking. So when the recipe is gone you can confidently navigate the kitchen. The promise: Taste improvement after one dinner with Zest.

FEATURES:

STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS
We've all tried cooking a TikTok recipe. You rewatch the video 13 times to figure out what the hell is going on. Zest embeds videos throughout recipes so you can click into content when you need it. No more pausing and restarting. Learn at your own pace.
 
CONCEPT VIDEOS
Watch a short video on a new concept at your own pace and then cook recipes that reinforce what you've learned. We dive into topics like the science of tasting and the basics of seasoning, sautéing, roasting and more!

SKILL VIDEOS
Don't know how to dice an onion? Don't be embarrassed, we got you covered. Skill videos are linked in each recipe to guide you along, so you don't have to watch Gordon Ramsey on YouTube (we love his accent too).

CURATED MENU
Choose a menu to fit your preferences. Tired of wasting produce? Search for dishes including what’s already in your fridge. Got allergies? Compile safe recipes in your menu to find them when you’re ready to get cooking. 

GROCERY LIST
Shop your menu with our automated grocery list. Plus, utilize our helpful tips while you shop. Don't know what a neutral oil is? We got you covered.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
Rate the recipes you cook, so we can recommend similar ones.

Feedback? Technical Issues? Killer ideas you want to contribute to make our app better? Email us at support@zestapp.co. We're always here to help and would love to chef up new ideas together!
